title: Bug 15899: Close all saved does not work all the time
OB: When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, the 'Close All Saved' option does not always function correctly. Specifically, after closing all editors, creating a new file f1.txt, and selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu, nothing happens.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:  
1. Use build 20020508 with the latest UI code.  
2. Close all editors.  
3. Create a new file named f1.txt.  
4. Select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu.
